programme.title: Gone In 60 Seconds, (1974, Action)
programme.desc: Buckle-up as Eleanor, the fast and furious Ford Fastback Mustang, takes you on a full-throttle ride you'll never forget. The Assignment: To steal 48 muscle and exotic cars! The Challenge: Avoid getting caught!

programme.title: Saturday Night Fever, (1976, Music)
programme.desc: John Travolta performs as the troubled Tony Manero - Brooklyn paint store clerk by day and undisputed king of the dance floor by night. A powerful and provocative urban tragedy that carries as much significance today as it did in 1977.

programme.title: The Harder They Come, (1972, Action)
programme.desc: Reggae legend Jimmy Cliff stars as Ivan Martin, an aspiring singer hoping to make a name for himself. Robbed of his money and possessions, he finds work with a self-righteous preacher

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The Paradox Brothers summon the almighty Gate Guardian, a monster that reflects all attacks! Is Joey helping Yugi in this duel, or is his lack of experience sealing their fate for defeat?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and Joey each unleash their strongest monster, the Summoned Skull, and the Red-Eyes Black Dragon, but their strength pales in comparison to the tremendous power of the Gate Guardian.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: In order to earn the right to challenge Pegasus, Kaiba must first beat Yugi and take his Star Chips. The rematch between Yugi and Kaiba is about to begin!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Kaiba summons the Blue-Eyes Ultimate Dragon, the strongest monster in the game fused from three Blue-Eyes White Dragons! Yugi has lost all his powerful Duel Monsters, but a true duelist never gives up!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi begins spinning a strategy to put the Blue-Eyes Ultimate Dragon to rest, but he must decide whether to claim victory or spare Kaiba his life. Yugi's heart is split in two!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Having lost his star chips to Kaiba and his only opportunity to save Grandpa, Yugi is in a state of shock. Can Tea bring Yugi back to consciousness by defeating Mai for her extra star chips and teach Yugi the heart of the duelist?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and friends enter the castle to discover Kaiba ready to duel Pegasus with Mokuba's soul hanging in the balance! The power of the Millennium Eye gives Pegasus the ability to read other people's minds.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Kaiba is helpless against Pegasus's Toon World deck and mind-reading abilities. As the duel ends, Pegasus imprisons Kaiba's soul into a card, just like Grandpa and Mokuba!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi vows to overthrow Pegasus for the sake of his Grandpa. Tristan leads an exploration party to uncover Pegasus's secrets. While Joey sleeps, Bandit Keith steals from him the card that permits his entry in the final battle!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Under Pegasus's glare, Yugi is distracted from his duel with Mai. After making foolish errors and allowing Mai to gain a huge advantage with her Harpie's Pet Dragon, will Yugi gather his focus or succumb to the pressure?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Mai has rebounded from her previous loss to Joey to become a better duelist. Has Yugi learned from his loss to Kaiba, or is the emotional defeat still weighing on his heart? The answer is in the cards!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Joey searches for the card that permits him to enter the final battle, not realizing Bandit Keith has stolen it. As he struggles to accept the fact that Serenity will be blind forever, he receives help from a new friend!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: After Bandit Keith's Machine deck forces Joey to take the defensive, Joey mimics Keith's battle strategy to metalize his Red-Eyes Black Dragon! Is victory assured, or does the cheater Bandit Keith literally have one last card up his sleeve?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Joey challenges Yugi for the right to face Pegasus. In a battle between friends, a fierce match ensues between the two people who know each other's strategies and cards.
programme.sub-title: Best of Friends Best of Duelists, Part 1

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi is shocked as Joey uses the Time Wizard card on him. It's the very same card Yugi gave Joey as a sign of friendship!
programme.sub-title: Best of Friends Best of Duelists, Part 2

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi prepares for the ultimate battle against Pegasus with the souls of Grandpa, Kaiba, and Mokuba on the line.
programme.sub-title: Yugi vs. Pegasus Match of the Millennium, Part 1

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Pegasus punishes Yugi using the same Toon Deck and mind-reading abilities he used on Kaiba. As Pegasus turns Yugi's monsters against him, Yugi loses the will to battle. Will Pegasus capture Yugi's soul into a card, just like Kaiba?
programme.sub-title: Yugi vs. Pegasus Match of the Millennium, Part 2

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi has found a counter to Pegasus's mind-reading ability: Yugi switches back and forth between his two souls! Yugi is able to destroy Pegasus's Toon World, but the duel has just only begun. The next level of the deadly Shadow Game is about to start!
programme.sub-title: Yugi vs. Pegasus Match of the Millennium, Part 3

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi crumples under the power of the Shadow Game. His friends yell desperate encouragement, but their voices cannot penetrate the sphere of darkness. Yugi's chance at victory is slipping away, as is his life!
programme.sub-title: Yugi vs. Pegasus Match of the Millennium, Part 4

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Pegasus summons Relinquished, a fearsome monster that can consume Yugi's Duel Monsters! Yugi counters with… Kuriboh?
programme.sub-title: Yugi vs. Pegasus Match of the Millennium, Part 5

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi meets a mysterious Egyptian named Shadi who enters Yugi's mind with the Millennium Key. What are these Millennium Items, and do they hold the answer to the mystery behind the Shadow Games?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and friends return from the Duelist Kingdom only to meet a young girl named Rebecca who demands that Grandpa return Blue-Eyes White Dragon to her.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Rebecca mistakenly believes that Grandpa stole the Blue-Eyes White Dragon from her grandfather. Yugi must defend the Blue-Eyes White Dragon to teach her that it's not the power of the cards, but the heart that's in them that counts.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The two-faced Board of Directors of Kaiba Corporation trap Kaiba inside a virtual reality game. Mokuba recruits Yugi and Joey to free Kaiba from this ultimate game where losing equals death!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The quest for Kaiba continues with a little help from… Mai? But can YUGI and friends adapt to a virtual world where the rules and strategies keep changing every step of the way?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and friends rescue Kaiba, but they are still stuck in the game! The only exit is past a Five-Headed Dragon, but in the difficult duel, Joey, Mokuba, and Mailose all their life points!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Duke Devlin defeats Joey and humiliates him in public, forcing Yugi to challenge Duke to a duel. However, this will not be a Duel Monsters duel, but a new game named Dungeon Dice Monsters!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: In exchange for Joey's freedom, Yugi agrees to give up Duel Monsters forever if he loses. Unfamiliar with the rules, Yugi gets off to a rough start.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi uses his innate gaming skills to turn the tables on Duke, but Duke has one more rule to mention: All creatures take up territory on the grid-like board. With no room to summon any new monsters, Yugi's position is helpless!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: After Duke's all-powerful Orogoth The Relentless dices Yugi's entire cadre of monsters into shreds, Yugi only has one turn left before he loses all his heart points!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: An arcane fortune teller steals the Millennium Puzzle and Yugi must defeat him in a duel to win it back.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The mysterious menace controlling Bandit Keith shatters the Millennium Puzzle into pieces before setting the dueling arena ablaze. Can Yugi put the Millennium Puzzle back together and save the spirit before the entire room is engulfed in flames?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The origin of Duel Monsters is revealed. Using the magic of the Millennium Necklace, Egyptian historian Ishizu Ishtar shows Kaiba how Duel Monsters was played millenniums ago.

programme.title: All but done for, Sanji is trapped by Violet and her crew when she suddenly changes her mind and mysteriously turns on her own men! Meanwhile, Robin and Usopp come face to face with the Little People known as the Tontatta Tribe.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Unknown World! The Tontatta Kingdom!

programme.title: Sanji gets in touch with Law in order to share a shocking secret - that could unsettle the Straw Hats' plans in Dressrosa for good! Meanwhile, Luffy's Block C battle begins, but will his Gum-Gum powers give him away?
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Stratagem of the Century! Doflamingo Makes His Move!

programme.title: Sanji and Franky try to regroup after Doflamingo's betrayal, hoping that destroying the factory is not yet out of their grasp. Meanwhile Luffy makes a friend in the Colosseum and Usopp ends up thrust into an uncomfortable position!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Shaking Heaven and Earth! Admiral Fujitora's Power!

programme.title: The Sunny is mysteriously deformed by the bizarre powers of Giolla! Can Nami, Chopper, and Brook act in time to save their beloved home? Meanwhile, the battle for Block C continues as Luffy suffers a staggering setback.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Blow of Anger! A Giant vs. Lucy!

programme.title: After knocking down the Giant, Hajrudin, as payback for what he did to Ucy, Luffy has to deal with Ideo, whose punch has the destructive force of a bomb, while the Funk Brothers show off their bizarre fighting technique.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Destruction Cannon Blasts! Lucy in Trouble!

programme.title: Nami, Chopper, and Brooke keep trying to evade Jora and win back the Sunny even though it's been turned into a piece of art! In the Colosseum, Don Chin Jao finally faces Luffy - whose power will prove greater?
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Legendary Pirate! Don Chin Jao!

programme.title: Luffy stands along against Don Chinjao, and learns about the old grudge he bears against Garp! Meanwhile, Usopp and Robin get swept up in the Tontatta Kingdom's raid against the royal family, and Franky learns the eerie secret of Dressrosa.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Light and Shadow! Darkness behind Dressrosa!

programme.title: The Tontatta Kingdom gears up for its all-out assault on the Doflamingo Family, as Usopp and Robin are caught up in the war effort! Meanwhile, Franky arrives the headquarters of the toy movement where he finds Zoro, Nami & the others are cornered by Jora.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Making a Sortie! The Legendary Hero Usoland!

programme.title: Don Chin Jao's hatred of Garp and Luffy is finally explained, while his battle against Luffy comes to an end. With tremendous power, one of them is squarely eliminated! But is that really the end of the Colosseum battle?
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Fierce Battle Coming to the End! Lucy vs. Chin Jao!

programme.title: With the battle with Don Chinjao long behind him, Luffy advances to the final round! Block-D contender Cavendish, however, takes the chance and pounces on Luffy, who is defended by an unlikely ally! The agenda of Colosseum gladiator Rebecca is exposed.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Luffy and the Gladiator of Fate - Rebecca!

programme.title: Rebecca's deep bonds with the one-legged toy soldier are revealed! Her lineage can be traced to the previous ruler of Dressrosa - and her eternal bond with the damaged toy is linked to the violent overthrow of that regime by none other than Doflamingo!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Protect You to the End! Rebecca and the Toy Soldier!

programme.title: As Rebecca enters the ring for the battle for Block D, the crowd shows its contempt for her heritage - only to be scolded by an unlikely supporter. Meanwhile, the other Straw Hats start to reassemble to deal with the attack on the Sunny.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Last - and Bloodiest - Block! Block D Battle Begins!

programme.title: Doflamingo recounts for Law the surprising history of the Don Quixote Family, while Nami and the others battle the insane and powerful artist, Giolla! Her ultimate attack renders them incapacitated, and prompts the betrayal of one of their closest allies!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Decisive Battle! Giolla vs. the Straw Hats!

programme.title: Law is pinned by Fujitora, and Doflamingo has the upper hand! Only the most cunning of tricks could save Law's plan to hand Caesar over to Nami & the others! Meanwhile, the Sunny falls into danger again, & the battle for Block D heats up in the Colosseum.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Beautiful Sword! Cavendish of the White Horse!

programme.title: Law must put himself in harm's way to defend the Sunny and the Straw Hats from Doflamingo's all-out assault! With barely enough time to save the crew, plans change and send the Sunny on a new mission -- but will it be able to get underway?
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Big Clash! Sanji vs. Doflamingo!

programme.title: Law & Doflamingo are embroiled in a heated showdown which triggers Momonosuke's memories of Doflamingo's cruelty from the first time they met; meanwhile, after a tearful fanboy conversation Zoro finally gets to see Luffy but all eyes are fixed on Rebecca.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Rebecca's Special Attack! Last-Ditch Sword Dance!

programme.title: Bartolomeo searches the Colosseum for Luffy but stumbles upon the medical center for the losers of the battles in the ring, but is everything at this center as it seems? Meanwhile, Rebecca has to fend off Rolling Logan's vicious bone-crushing grip attack.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Most Violent Fighter! Logan vs. Rebecca!

programme.title: The losers of the Colosseum battle who are being held below the infirmary have a surprising person in their midst! But do they have a clue as to their terrifying fate? Meanwhile, the Tontatta Kingdom's history is made clear.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Big Surprise! The True Identity of the Toy Soldier!

programme.title: Bartolomeo finally finds Luffy and starts to lead him to Zoro, while the toy soldier begins to tell the heart-breaking story of how Doflamingo cheated the Riku dynasty out of their control of Dressrosa!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Horrible Past! The Secret of Dressrosa!

programme.title: As the toy soldier's story continues, the sad fate of King Riku and his army, and his daughter Princess Viola, is revealed as well as how the people of Dressrosa fell into the hands of Doflamingo. And all the toys in the country share a mysterious secret.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Nightmare! The Tragic Night of Dressrosa!

programme.title: Zoro, Kin'emon, and Luffy are reunited again, but little do they know that their reunion is being monitored by a potential threat! Meanwhile, the battle rages on between Doflamingo and Law as these two powerhouses clash.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Showdown Between the Warlords! Law vs. Doflamingo!

programme.title: Zoro and Kin'emon make a mad dash to save Law but Navy Admiral Fujitora stands in their way, bringing his full power against them. The Navy is in hot pursuit as a ship approaches with unexpected visitors from the past.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Two Great Rivals Meet Each Other! Straw Hat and Heavenly Demon!

programme.title: After revealing the horrible history of Dressrosa, Toy Soldier now shares their plan to liberate the Tontatta Kingdom and bring down the Doflamingo Family, Operation SOP. Luffy bumps into a heavily-wounded Bellamy and Bartolomeo
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Luffy Astonished! The Man Who Inherits Ace's Will!

programme.title: Usopp and Robin make their way via an underground tunnel dug by the tiny people of the Tontatta Tribe - a tunnel so small in fact, that Franky couldn't fit! Instead, Franky makes his way to the Toy House.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Operation SOP Starts! Usoland Charges Forth!

programme.title: As the contenders for the battle of Block D dwindle to only thirty, Rebecca has her hands full with the menacing Suleiman the Beheader! All hope seems lost that she can take him down and move on to the finals!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Burning Passion! Rebecca vs. Suleiman!

programme.title: The battle for Block D comes to a shocking end and the winner that emerges from the cloud of dust stuns the audience even more! Meanwhile, Luffy, Zoro, Kin'emon, and Wicka of the Tontatta Tribe are about to reach the lift to the palace.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The End of the Match?! A Surprising Result of Block D!

programme.title: Viola, aka Violet, once a great princess of the Dressrosa family, shows Luffy & the others a secret entrance into the palace which avoids the use of the heavily-guarded lift. In the palace's Suit Chamber, Navy Admiral Fujitora reveals his plans.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Admiral's Decision! Fujitora vs. Doflamingo!

programme.title: The final round at the Corrida Colosseum finally begins, as Diamante joins the combatants in an all-out struggle to win the Flare-Flare Fruit! As the stakes escalate, can one champion beat the others & snatch the fruit from the Colosseum's newest hazard?
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Final Round Starts! Diamante the Hero Shows Up!

programme.title: Luffy and his group continue their ascent towards Doflamingo's inner sanctum, but standing in their way is an executive of the family whose power is so strong moving past him seems impossible! Meanwhile, Cavendish learns the dark secrets of Dressrosa.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Moving Castle! The Top Executive Pica Rises Up!

programme.title: As Operation SOP finally gets underway but as Leo makes the dash to hide the Tatabasco grape in Sugar's fruit basket, Robin calls for an emergency stop to the plan! Meanwhile, Luffy, Violet, and Zoro are stalled by Pica whose sheer size overwhelms them.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Dragon Claw Strikes! Lucy's Intimidating Attack!

programme.title: Operation SOP is underway and nearing its final stage! But Trebol proves a far stronger guard for Sugar than was expected, so Robin hatches a plan to lure him away. But is there enough time to execute the plan before the ruse is discovered?
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Defeat Sugar! The Army of the Little People Charges!

programme.title: The Tontattas are devastated by Trebol's furious attack, but as Usopp tries to convince Leo to abort the operation, Leo tells him about their commander Toy Soldier's stunning true identity! The Toy Soldier finally shakes off Lao G and gets moving again!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Last Light of Hope! The Secret of Our Commander!

programme.title: Zoro continues his deadly duel with the nearly indestructible Pica! While the Toy Soldier narrowly escapes Lao G only to come face to face with Gladius! Luffy continues his mad dash to the top of the palace to face Doflamingo!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Rupture Human! Gladius Blows Up Big Time!

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Orion's Crown has been stolen and is up for grabs at a black-market auction. Lupin has his eyes on both the crown and the auction money, but first he must outsmart the other parties vying for the crown, including Fujiko.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: A two-thousand-year-old casket has been excavated. Inside the casket is Camilla, a beautiful woman in a near-death state, holding a golden statuette of the Virgin Mary. Lupin attempts to steal the golden statuette, but things don't go as planned…
programme.sub-title: Lupin Who Turned into a Vampire

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin and his gang are attending a party in Africa, waiting for an opportunity to snatch a rare black pearl. However, their plan goes awry when a gang of gorillas crashes the party and steals the black pearl.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Massive riches have been hidden inside Tsukikage Castle. Lupin and his gang must decipher a code to find out the whereabouts of this great treasure. Wii Lupin be able to locate the treasure before his rivals do?
programme.sub-title: Uncover the Secret of Tsukikage Castle

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin and Jigen head to Mongolia in search of Genghis Khan's treasures. Meanwhile, Goemon is visiting his ancestor's grave to pay his respects when he encounters Fujiko, who is in search of Yoshitsune Minamoto's buried treasure.
programme.sub-title: The Hidden Gold of Genghis Khan

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: The ICPO chief promises to erase Fujiko's criminal record in exchange for her cooperation in arresting Lupin. Up against an ego-bruised Inspector Zenigata and a determined Fujiko, have Lupin's heisting days come to an end?

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin and Jigen sneak on board a ship smuggling diamonds. However, what they find on board are several thousand chickens! Lupin and his gang infiltrate the Hong Kong smuggling boss's lair where diamonds are being illicitly sold…
programme.sub-title: Diamonds Disappeared Under the Sky of Hong Kong

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin and his gang steal a suitcase containing Costa Rican diamonds, but the contents turns out to be Inspector Zenigata. The real diamonds are being shipped to Puerto Rico inside a missile and Lupin must find out the precise launch time to intercept it.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Kaguya, a beautiful woman, separately asks Lupin, Jigen and Goemon to gather the tears of the Yeti, a mermaid's scale, and the liver of a dragon so she can make a secret potion.
programme.sub-title: Search for the Treasure of Princess Kaguya

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: A wealthy shipping magnate and also a bachelor, Onabes' final voyage is nothing short of extravagant, with a ship full of beautiful women and fine art. Things go as planned when Lupin infiltrates the ship disguised as a woman…

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin is in Hong Kong for a vacation when he is asked to find a woman in return for helping him escape from Inspector Zenigata. Lupin discovers the pickpocket who stole his wallet is the daughter of the woman he is looking for…
programme.sub-title: Where are the Peking Man's Bones?

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: The Sleeping Lion, a statue made of solid gold, is being transported to a museum by a specially armored, airtight car. Lupin steals the armored car together with the statue and nearly asphyxiated Inspector Zenigata inside.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin manages to steal crime boss Mulligan's precious jewels, only have them stolen from him by Fujiko! Mulligan, unaware that Fujiko has his jewels, hires a skilled gunman named Hangman to take them back from Lupin.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin has been put on auction at the Wanted Club and Dr. Mad places the winning bid. Dr. Mad also purchases Fujiko and Jigen from the auctions. The three are abandoned on a deserted island with killer cyborgs.
programme.sub-title: Lupin is Available to the Highest Bidder

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin has his eyes on the royal family's Imperial State Crown, but thanks to Scotland Yard's Inspector Dover, stealing it won't be easy.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin announces he's going to steal the betting takes at the Kentucky Derby, but the heist fails. However, it's all part of the plan. Lupin's main target is really the Metropolitan Bank's underground vault.
programme.sub-title: Lupin Laughs at the Alarm Bell

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: After several divorces and a couple of deceased husbands, Jacqueline has amassed a fortune and a collection of impressive jewels. In a twist of fate, Lupin and Jacqueline become close... Too close for Jigen and Goemon's comfort…

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: An illicit auction selling smuggled treasures is taking place. Lupin targets the auction. In the process, Lupin discovers the auctioneer is Cornelia, the woman he once loved who died saving his life…
programme.sub-title: The Lupin I Loved, Part One

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin is reunited with Cornelia, a woman who died by her father's hands to save Lupin's life. However, Cornelia's memories of Lupin have been erased. Her father is Dr. Zel, a Nazi who has succeeded in resurrecting corpses and controlling them.
programme.sub-title: The Lupin I Loved, Part Two

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Fujiko discovers that the Holy Scripture for Immortality is hidden within the jungles of Thailand. However, Emmanuelle Poirot, a cold-hearted beauty, is after them too.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Phantoma Mark III, grandson of the mysterious master thief and disguise artist Phantoma, who terrorized Europe during his heyday, is plotting to take over the world…

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: The aging Inspector Hanshichi Mikawa, who failed to capture Lupin 10 years ago, is viewed as a nuisance by his peers at the downtown police station. Lupin has announced he'll be stealing the golden Kannon statuette.
programme.sub-title: Detective Hanshichi, The Tenth Year Promise

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin and his gang have stolen the "36 Views of Mt. Fuji," a famous series of 46 woodblock prints, from the exhibition hall. However, a gang calling itself the Shiranami Five challenges Lupin head-on by stealing one of the prints from him.
programme.sub-title: Mysterious Gang of Five, Part One

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Goemon, siding with the Shiranami Five, challenges Lupin to a one-on-one duel. While Goemon keeps Lupin busy, the Shiranami Five steals the 36 Views, but one of its members, Kikuko Benten, betrays her gang and escapes with the loot.
programme.sub-title: Mysterious Gang of Five, Part Two

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: On a wild whim, Inspector Zenigata swipes a throwing coin owned by his great Edo-era ancestor, Heiji Zenigata while he's viewing the inside of an incredible new safe protected by Professor Hunter's super computer.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin and Jigen are after the Aurora Droplet, a diamond adorning a prima ballerina's tiara. During the heist, Jigen is wounded and in a twist of fate, is saved by Monica, the prima ballerina.
programme.sub-title: The Face of Goodbye at the National Border

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: After shaking off Inspector Zenigata's pursuit, Lupin is stopped by a monstrously huge Fujiko on his way home! The giant Fujiko turns out to be an illusion created by Madame X. Lupin learns Madame X's hobby is collecting famous people.
programme.sub-title: The Mysterious World of Madame X

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Bandit leader Basara is determined to sniff out the location of the diamonds Lupin has hidden somewhere in India. Armed with his sinister invention, the Suicide Ray Gun, he tries to make Lupin talk, even trying his luck with a fake Fujiko.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Trouble is all but guaranteed when a crime boss and an arms merchant join hands. The two set their eyes on Goemen's sword, which can split a tank in half! After hiring Fujiko to steal it, they transform the sword into an invincible flying weapon of war.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Jigen and Gomen have sent a letter saying they are being held captive in a small but terrifying village. Lupin arrives in the village to rescue them, but Jigen and Goemon are acting oddly.
programme.sub-title: The Sound of the Devil's Bell Calls Lupin

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Don Kecchi, the wealthiest man in America, is terminally ill and has announced that he's donating his entire fortune to charity. However, Lupin steals Kecchi's money and shoots Fujiko right in front of Inspector Zenigata!

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Margaret Tiffany, the owner of Tiffany's and a TV anchor, hires Lupin and his gang to rob her jewelry store on live TV. Initially, Lupin refuses, but ends up having to go through with it thanks to Fujiko's wild spending habits.
programme.sub-title: Christmas is in the Goddess' Hands

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: A princess of a small Silk Road country has been kidnapped. Lupin and his gang are persuaded to rescue Princess Yasmin in exchange for a stomach full of holy curry meant for the gods. However, the kidnapping was a trap to lure Lupin.

programme.title: Terminator 2: Judgment Day, (1991, Action)
programme.desc: The non-human machine ruling elite of the nuclear war-torn future has dispatched a cyborg assassin into the past to kill a young boy because he soon will be the resistance leader against the machines.

programme.title: Terminator Genisys, (2015, Action)
programme.desc: When John Connor sends Kyle Reese back to 1984 to protect a young Sarah Connor, unexpected events alter the past and threaten the future for all mankind. Charged with a new mission, Reese must join forces with Sarah and her "Guardian" to save the world.

programme.title: The Running Man, (1987, Action)
programme.desc: A wrongly-convicted man must try to survive a public execution gauntlet staged as a TV game show.

programme.title: Terminator 2: Judgment Day, (1991, Action)
programme.desc: The non-human machine ruling elite of the nuclear war-torn future has dispatched a cyborg assassin into the past to kill a young boy because he soon will be the resistance leader against the machines.

programme.title: Terminator Genisys, (2015, Action)
programme.desc: When John Connor sends Kyle Reese back to 1984 to protect a young Sarah Connor, unexpected events alter the past and threaten the future for all mankind. Charged with a new mission, Reese must join forces with Sarah and her "Guardian" to save the world.

programme.title: The Running Man, (1987, Action)
programme.desc: A wrongly-convicted man must try to survive a public execution gauntlet staged as a TV game show.

programme.title: Terminator 2: Judgment Day, (1991, Action)
programme.desc: The non-human machine ruling elite of the nuclear war-torn future has dispatched a cyborg assassin into the past to kill a young boy because he soon will be the resistance leader against the machines.

programme.title: Terminator Genisys, (2015, Action)
programme.desc: When John Connor sends Kyle Reese back to 1984 to protect a young Sarah Connor, unexpected events alter the past and threaten the future for all mankind. Charged with a new mission, Reese must join forces with Sarah and her "Guardian" to save the world.

programme.title: Blood On The Arrow, (1964, Drama)
programme.desc: In 1871 Arizona, an escaped outlaw survives an Indian attack and helps a trading-post family retrieve their kidnapped son from marauding Apaches.

programme.title: Little Big Man, (1970, Drama)
programme.desc: From director Arthur Penn (BONNIE AND CLYDE), Dustin Hoffman, Chief Dan George, Faye Dunaway, Martin Balsam, Jeff Corey and Richard Mulligan star in a genre-defying tale of an alleged 121-year-old white survivor of Custer's Last Stand.

programme.title: The Magnificent Seven, (1960, Drama)
programme.desc: Yul Brynner stars as one of seven gunslingers pitted against an army of marauding bandits in this rousing classic that made stars of Steve McQueen, Charles Bronson, and James Coburn. Eli Wallach also stars in this timeless tale of good versus evil.

programme.title: Return of the Seven, (1966, Drama)
programme.desc: Starring Yul Brynner and a stellar supporting cast that includes Robert Fuller, Warren Oates, and Claude Akins, this classic western adventure follows the legendary Magnificent Seven as they thunder through Mexico to face the shootout of their lives!

programme.title: Guns of The Magnificent Seven, (1969, Drama)
programme.desc: In this thrilling follow-up to one of the greatest Western sagas in film history, notorious desperado Chris Adams (George Kennedy) is offered a huge reward to free a young Mexican revolutionary from prison…in the midst of the Mexican Revolution.

programme.title: The Magnificent Seven Ride!, (1972, Drama)
programme.desc: When his wife is killed, Marshal Chris Adams (Lee Van Cleef) discovers that a ruthless horde of marauders has killed all the men -- and will come back for the women -- in a nearby border town...unless The Magnificent Seven can stop them!

programme.title: The Magnificent Seven, (1960, Drama)
programme.desc: Yul Brynner stars as one of seven gunslingers pitted against an army of marauding bandits in this rousing classic that made stars of Steve McQueen, Charles Bronson, and James Coburn. Eli Wallach also stars in this timeless tale of good versus evil.

programme.title: Return of the Seven, (1966, Drama)
programme.desc: Starring Yul Brynner and a stellar supporting cast that includes Robert Fuller, Warren Oates, and Claude Akins, this classic western adventure follows the legendary Magnificent Seven as they thunder through Mexico to face the shootout of their lives!

programme.title: Valhalla: A Lenda De Thor
programme.desc: As crianças Vikings Røskva e Tjalfe embarcam em uma aventura de Midgard a Valhalla com os deuses Thor e Loki. A vida em Asgard, no entanto, acaba sendo ameaçada pelo temido lobo Fenrir e pelos arqui-inimigos bárbaros dos deuses, os Jotnar. Agora, eles devem lutar juntos para salvar Valhalla do fim do mundo, o Ragnarok, como é conhecido.

programme.title: Codinome Cassius 7
programme.desc: Um agente aposentado da CIA se une a um agente do FBI para desvendar o mistério do assassinato de um senador.

programme.title: O Médico
programme.desc: Inglaterra, século XI. Ainda criança, Rob vê sua mãe morrer em decorrência da "doença do lado". O garoto cresce sob os cuidados de Bader (Stellan Sarsgard), o barbeiro local, que vende bebidas que prometem curar doenças. Ao crescer, Rob (Tom Payne) aprende tudo o que Bader sabe sobre cuidar de pessoas doentes, mas ele sonha em saber mais. Após Bader passar por uma operação nos olhos, Rob descobre que na Pérsia há um médico famoso, Ibn Sina (Ben Kingsley), que coordena um hospital, algo impensável na Inglaterra. Para aprender com ele, Rob aceita não apenas fazer uma longa viagem rumo à Ásia mas também esconde o fato de ser cristão, já que apenas judeus e árabes podem entrar na Pérsia.

programme.title: Apex
programme.desc: Cinco caçadores de elite são pagos para caçar um homem em uma ilha deserta. Mas quando a presa começa a reagir, os papéis de caçador e presa trocam de lado…

programme.title: Juízo Final
programme.desc: Um vírus se espalha por toda a Escócia, infectando e matando milhares de pessoas. As autoridades colocam em quarentena brutal o país, que sucumbe ao medo e ao caos. Três décadas depois, o vírus ressurge violentamente em Londres.

programme.title: Sangue Na Veia
programme.desc: Uma mulher se vê contra o submundo do crime quando seu marido desaparece durante a lua-de-mel. Decidida a recuperá-lo, ela enfrentará qualquer um que cruzar seu caminho.

programme.title: Valhalla: A Lenda De Thor
programme.desc: As crianças Vikings Røskva e Tjalfe embarcam em uma aventura de Midgard a Valhalla com os deuses Thor e Loki. A vida em Asgard, no entanto, acaba sendo ameaçada pelo temido lobo Fenrir e pelos arqui-inimigos bárbaros dos deuses, os Jotnar. Agora, eles devem lutar juntos para salvar Valhalla do fim do mundo, o Ragnarok, como é conhecido.

programme.desc: Um agente aposentado da CIA se une a um agente do FBI para desvendar o mistério do assassinato de um senador.

Após Bader passar por uma operação nos olhos, Rob descobre que na Pérsia há um médico famoso, Ibn Sina (Ben Kingsley), que coordena um hospital, algo impensável na Inglaterra. programme.title: Apex
programme.desc: Cinco caçadores de elite são pagos para caçar um homem em uma ilha deserta. Mas quando a presa começa a reagir, os papéis de caçador e presa trocam de lado…

programme.title: Sobibor
programme.desc: O oficial soviético, Alexander Pechersky, organiza uma revolta e fuga em massa de prisioneiros do campo de extermínio de Sobibór, em outubro de 1943.

programme.title: A Espada De Deus - A Última Cruzada
programme.desc: Dois cavaleiros cristãos chegam a uma ilha remota com a intenção de converter os aldeões pagãos à sua religião. O primeiro busca conquistá-los com compreensão e humildade, enquanto o segundo confia na intimidação e na violência. À medida que a ruptura se forma, os aldeões devem decidir de que lado estão, e os homens, até onde estão dispostos a ir e quanto sangue será derramado.

programme.title: Em Busca Do Castelo Dourado
programme.desc: Quando o rei e a rainha são envenenados, os irmãos Per e Pal são presos suspeitos do crime. O caçula da família, Espen Ash Lad e a princesa Kristin embarcam em uma perigosa jornada em busca do lendário castelo Soria Moria e da fonte da Água da Vida - a única coisa que pode curar os pais de Kristin e salvar o reino.

programme.title: A Menina e o Leão
programme.desc: Mia se muda para a África do Sul com sua família para administrar uma fazenda de leões e desenvolve um vínculo especial com Charlie, um filhote de leão branco. As coisas mudam quando ela descobre o segredo de seu pai. Desolada com a possibilidade de Charlie estar em perigo, Mia decide fugir. Os dois partem em uma aventura épica em busca de outra terra onde Charlie possa viver seguro e livre

programme.title: O Caçador e o Livro Mágico
programme.desc: Um lendário caçador de demônios, interpretado por Jackie Chan, investiga o desaparecimento de jovens garotas de um vilarejo. Quando descobre que forças malignas estão sequestrando as meninas para se banquetearem com suas almas, ele parte para salvar a humanidade

programme.title: O Livro do Amor
programme.desc: Após a morte de sua esposa grávida, Henry encontra-se perdido em uma vida centrada no trabalho.

programme.title: O Mistério da Fé
programme.desc: Uma pequena cidade do interior enfrenta os desafios após adolescentes sofrerem overdose acidental

programme.title: Nada é para sempre
programme.desc: Embora Norman e Paul, filhos de um pastor protestante, tenham recebido uma educação rígida, eles também desfrutaram de liberdade. Norman, um jovem reservado e criterioso, é professor e está apaixonado. Paul, extrovertido, é jornalista e leva uma vida desordenada. Apesar de tudo, há uma coisa que sempre os manterá juntos: o rio selvagem que atravessa Montana, onde aprenderam a pescar.

programme.title: Em Busca Do Castelo Dourado
programme.desc: Quando o rei e a rainha são envenenados, os irmãos Per e Pal são presos suspeitos do crime. O caçula da família, Espen Ash Lad e a princesa Kristin embarcam em uma perigosa jornada em busca do lendário castelo Soria Moria e da fonte da Água da Vida - a única coisa que pode curar os pais de Kristin e salvar o reino.

programme.title: A Menina e o Leão

programme.title: O Caçador e o Livro Mágico

programme.title: O Livro do Amor
programme.desc: Após a morte de sua esposa grávida, Henry encontra-se perdido em uma vida centrada no trabalho.

programme.title: Dummie A Múmia e a Tumba de Achnetut
programme.desc: Dummie está com saudades de casa e quer voltar para visitar o túmulo de seus pais.

programme.title: Enviado do Ceu
programme.desc: Quando um pastor da cidade é transferido para uma igreja rural, ele e sua família precisam encontrar um jeito de se adaptar ao novo ambiente desconhecido.

programme.title: Sono Mortal
programme.desc: Uma jovem deve salvar a si mesma e seus amigos a partir de um antigo mal, que persegue suas vítimas através do fenômeno da vida real de paralisia do sono.

Em um futuro próximo, as mudanças climáticas tornaram necessário o uso de oxigênio artificial para respirar. Com sua esposa doente e pouca esperança de sobrevivência, Ethan (Smit-McPhee) é forçado a viajar para o futuro para encontrar uma cura para sua misteriosa doença. Sem saber em quem confiar, ele precisa navegar em um futuro repleto de perigos e sem a certeza de que voltará para casa.

programme.title: O Dom da Premonição
programme.desc: Annie Wilson (Cate Blanchett) uma viúva e mãe de três filhos, que possui também dons psíquicos. Para ganhar dinheiro, Annie resolve utilizar seus poderes oferecendo leituras psíquicas aos moradores da cidade onde reside, o que lhe custa a desconfiança da ala mais conservadora da população. Porém, tudo começa a piorar para Annie quando ela começa também a ver o lado negro das pessoas sua volta, ao mesmo tempo em que ocorre um assassinato na cidade. Com isso, ela precisará utilizar seus dons psíquicos para auxiliar a polícia local a solucionar o assassinato.

programme.title: Triângulo do Medo
programme.desc: Quando Jess embarca em um veleiro com um grupo de amigos para o alto mar, ela tem o pressentimento de algo está errado. Sua suspeita se realiza quando eles vão parar no meio de uma tempestade e para sobreviverem, todos são forçados a embarcar em um misterioso e aparentemente desocupado transatlântico. Ao caminhar pelos corredores, Jess tem a sensação de que já esteve no local antes e repara que o relógio do navio está parado. Estranhas coisas começam a acontecer e eles percebem que não estão sozinhos: alguém está caçando-os, um por um, e Jess, sem saber, está com a chave para encerrar todo esse terror.

programme.title: Reféns do Mal
programme.desc: Coisas sinistras começam a acontecer com os sequestradores que estão mantendo um menino para resgate em uma cabana remota.

programme.title: A Presença
programme.desc: Depois de ser sequestrado por alienígenas, um jovem cientista da NASA fica obcecado em encontrar pistas sobre o que aconteceu quando descobre que ninguém acredita que sua experiência realmente aconteceu.

programme.title: Sono Mortal
programme.desc: Uma jovem deve salvar a si mesma e seus amigos a partir de um antigo mal, que persegue suas vítimas através do fenômeno da vida real de paralisia do sono.

Em um futuro próximo, as mudanças climáticas tornaram necessário o uso de oxigênio artificial para respirar. Com sua esposa doente e pouca esperança de sobrevivência, Ethan (Smit-McPhee) é forçado a viajar para o futuro para encontrar uma cura para sua misteriosa doença. Sem saber em quem confiar, ele precisa navegar em um futuro repleto de perigos e sem a certeza de que voltará para casa.

Para ganhar dinheiro, Annie resolve utilizar seus poderes oferecendo leituras psíquicas aos moradores da cidade onde reside, o que lhe custa a desconfiança da ala mais conservadora da população. Sua suspeita se realiza quando eles vão parar no meio de uma tempestade e para sobreviverem, todos são forçados a embarcar em um misterioso e aparentemente desocupado transatlântico. Ao caminhar pelos corredores, Jess tem a sensação de que já esteve no local antes e repara que o relógio do navio está parado. Estranhas coisas começam a acontecer e eles percebem que não estão sozinhos: alguém está caçando-os, um por um, e Jess, sem saber, está com a chave para encerrar todo esse terror.

programme.title: Abraham Lincoln Contra os Zumbis
programme.desc: À medida que a Guerra Civil avança, o presidente Abraham Lincoln deve empreender uma tarefa ainda mais árdua: destruir os mortos-vivos confederados.

programme.title: Cidade Armada
programme.desc: Um adolescente e a sua mãe chegam a uma pequena cidade onde a cultura das armas é bem vista pela população. Apesar do trauma, pela perda do pai e a difícil relação com a mãe, Will, vai junto com o amigo Jonah, descobrir o poder de empunhar uma arma.

programme.title: Efeito Dominó
programme.desc: Em setembro de 1971 foi construído um túnel para dentro da caixa-forte de um banco na Baker Street, em Londres. De lá foram roubados diversos cofres de dinheiro e jóias, no valor de milhões de libras.

programme.title: Xeque-Mate
programme.desc: Slevin Kelevra (Josh Hartnett) está com vários problemas em sua vida. O prédio onde mora foi condenado, sua carteira de identidade foi roubada e ele recentemente flagrou sua namorada na cama com outro homem. Para escapar ao menos por algum tempo dos problemas, ele consegue emprestado com seu amigo Nick Fisher (Sam Jaeger) um apartamento em Nova York. Paralelamente um plano está sendo tramado no submundo do crime de Nova York. Para se vingar da morte de seu filho, o Chefe (Morgan Freeman) planeja um golpe no filho de seu arquiinimigo, o Rabino (Ben Kingsley). O Chefe contrata Goodkat (Bruce Willis) para executar o plano, que consiste em encontrar um apostador que deva muito dinheiro ao Chefe a ponto de aceitar matar o filho do Rabino para se livrar da dívida. O escolhido é Nick Fisher, o que faz com que Goodkat vá até seu apartamento e confunda Slevin com seu alvo.

programme.title: A Última Fronteira
programme.desc: Miguel, um médico espanhol, coloca-se em perigo para prestar tratamento médico às vítimas de revoltas militares. Wren é porta-voz de uma organização que financia assistência médica a nações empobrecidas em todo o mundo. Eles se conhecem na Libéria, onde Wren fica imediatamente impressionado com a abnegação, a habilidade médica e o charme de Miguel. Ambos iniciam um romance tórrido, que devem aprender a combinar com seu importante trabalho.

programme.title: Blitz
programme.desc: Blitz é um serial killer londrino que está matando policiais. O inspetor-chefe Roberts e o sargento Brant, um detetive de polícia durão, intransigente e politicamente incorreto, têm a tarefa de tentar deter o psicopata. Parece que Blitz comete os crimes para se tornar uma estrela dos tabloides - quanto mais ele mata, mais famoso se torna.

programme.title: As Duas Faces de Janeiro
programme.desc: Na década de 60, Chester e Colette são um casal que decide fazer turismo na Grécia. Eles conhecem Rydal, um americano que os ajuda nos passeios, mas que também é um vigarista. Porém, o guia trapaceiro descobre que os dois não são pessoas inocentes e uma estranha parceria acaba se formando.

programme.title: Plano de Fuga
programme.desc: Plano de Fuga traz Mel Gibson no papel de um criminoso americano que ultrapassa a fronteira entre Estados Unidos e México durante a fuga de um roubo a banco. Ele acaba preso pelas autoridades mexicanas e enviado para um presídio lotado de bandidos de alta periculosidade. Não bastasse essa experiência bizarra, ele acaba se envolvendo com uma família local e se metendo numa grande enrascada em terras estrangeiras porque a bandidagem agora quer a pele dele. Para sobreviver na prisão, ele terá que aceitar a ajuda de um garoto de apenas 9 anos (Kevin Hernandez), com quem irá planejar sua fuga.

programme.title: Efeito Dominó
